Description:
Flat Block with Triple garage, House plans and permits Approved!
Is this the flattest block in Cockatoo?
This gorgeous quarter acre allotment is perfectly located in a quiet street.
Featuring large lawn area, ready made driveway, triple sized garage with roller door access, concrete floor and tank.
There are drawings made up and a planning permit is approved - saving you valuable time to build your dream house (S.T.C.A)!

Description:
Stunning Mudbrick Home With A Massive Barn
Immerse yourself in the experience offered when entering this home combining mud brick and the warmth of timber raked ceilings with feature posts and beams. This unique property will thrill those looking for something individual. This character filled home is warmed by a gas log fire this cosy 2 bedroom home boasts sealed slate and timber floor. Feature timber lining gives rustic charm to the well equipped kitchen and lead light doors & windows enhance the feel. French doors open to a covered decked entertaining area which is the perfect place to sit back and relax and enjoy the beauty that surrounds. Add an American style barn, great for extra accommodation or those who wish to work from home, mezzanine floor and decking to top level allows easy access to this huge multipurpose area incorporating workshop and garage. Call today inspection is a must!!!

Description:
MODERN FAMILY HOME AMONGST PRIVATE & TRANQUIL GARDENS
Nestled on a private acre with a Northerly aspect and set amongst lush, private, low maintenance gardens with open lawns, you will find this 8YO home offering 35 squares of modern family living. The open plan family, dining and lounge rooms adjoin the stunning CeasarStone kitchen incorporating quality stainless steel appliances with a large walk in pantry, overlook the private lush gardens and the expansive alfresco area.
4 bedrooms include a vast parents retreat with study, large WIR and sprawling ensuite, with the remaining 3 generous in size, with built in robes and garden views.
The main bathroom offers a separate shower and bath, toilet and powder room.
An internal access triple car garage with remote door is further complimented by a separate powered double garage/workshop.
Some of the many other features include, gas ducted heating, 3 phase power, alarm system, wired internet, wool carpets, premium fittings and window furnishings.
Photo ID Required

Description:
A Private Hills Escape
Positioned on a private 1/4 acre allotment is this split level cedar weatherboard home. Featuring 3 bedrooms master with semi ensuite, neat kitchen with adjoining meal and family room, separate lounge which opens up to a large decked entertaining are which is the perfect place to sit back and relax with family and friends. There is gas ducted heating for convenience and a crackling wood fire. Outside there is plenty of to enjoy with established garden, double carport, 2 studio/storage areas and is all accessed by a private lane. Call today, homes this good don't last!

LOCATION & LIFESTYLE
Located within easy access to the school, shops & transport is this fantastic cedar weatherboard home that offers a low maintenance & relaxed lifestyle. The home features 3 bed all with BIR's, open plan kitchen/family meals area, polished timber floors, vaulted ceilings & gas heating that will ensure year round comfort. Outside you will discover a completely useable 1/4 acre allotment that offers large lawn areas, carport & front verandah. This home is perfect whether you are looking for a 1st home, investment or to down size. Call today inspection is a must!!

Located on the high side of the road overlooking native greenery this 1/2 acre allotment is ready for you to build your country dream (STCA). Walk to town, transport or sporting ground or simply sit back & relax & enjoy the privacy of living on a no-through road. The block is fenced on 3 sides & has a driveway established & all services are available, so call the builder & get the ball rolling!

Description:
Private Setting and Convenient Location!!!
This lovely split level cedar weatherboard home sits proudly on well over a 1/3 of an acre and is within walking distance to the main town, shops & transport. Offering polished timber floors, kitchen with adjoining meals area, 3 bedrooms, separate lounge, gas ducted heating, vaulted ceilings and a beautifully renovated bathroom, you can be sure you will be proud to call this your home! Outside offers a triple garage with games room, sweeping timber veranda that takes in a treed outlook, fish ponds, chicken run, bird aviaries, veggie garden, sealed road access and all this with Puffing Billy rolling past the rear of the property. Call today inspection is a must!!!

Description:
'Paradise' - 1/2 acre, big garage, immaculate home!
This property offers the best of both worlds with a low maintenance double brick home that is set amongst 1/2 an acre of established gardens including cumquats, lemon and lime trees, liquid amber, shady ladies, rhododendrons and lovely crepe myrtles.
The neat home offers open plan living with a formal meals area, family room and huge kitchen with dishwasher and plenty of cupboard space.
Large floor to ceiling windows capture wonderful views of the private block while allowing plenty of natural light to flood into the home.
If you're ready to try something new, there is a vine yard in the bottom corner of the block, which produces three varieties of red wine (Cab Sav, Merlot and Pinot Noir), which you can show off to your friends and family whilst entertaining on the decking overlooking the garden.
For the tradies or handyman, there is a 4 car garage complete with concrete floor, power and remote roller door to store all of your prized possessions.
Hurry to inspect - the vendor says 'SELL'!!!

Description:
Cute Character with Low Maintenance Yard
Privately situated on just under a 1/4 acre block is this character filled 3 bedroom home which would make an ideal home for a first home buyer, single person or couple or even a country retreat.
Set back on the block amongst the trees on a near level allotment, the home features lounge and dining room, country style kitchen flowing out onto the large rear deck and entertaining area.
The 3 bedrooms (2 with built in robes) are serviced by the modern central bathroom and light filled laundry.
Featuring polished floorboards throughout, gas ducted heating, wide front verandah, great storage shed, under-house storage, single carport plus plenty of off street parking and all services.
Sit down in the summer evenings on the verandah or rear deck and feel the nature that surrounds you whilst around the house is a securely fenced area for kids or pets.
This charmer won't last so be

EXPLORE THE POSSIBILITIES ON ALMOST 1/2 AN ACRE!
Come and see for yourself - this property screams potential and would be a perfect start for first home buyers or for those who are looking to make their mark and improve on this cedar weatherboard home. Nestled on a corner allotment on the high side of the road, the home offers split level living, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms plus a crackling wood fire.
Kids can play for hours on end in the fully fenced yard and entertain their friends in their very own cubby house!
Not to leave the tradies out, there is a massive three bay garage with workshop plus a double carport perfect for weekend projects.
Located only a short walk from the town centre, primary school and public transport - hurry along to inspect today!

Description:
OWNERS DOWNSIZING - FAMILY VALUE WITH 5 BEDROOMS!!!
The owners have taken meticulous care of this home over the years they have lived there but now they need to downsize as soon as possible.
The property consists of 5 oversized robed bedrooms, lounge room, dining room and upstairs retreat.
Ideally setup for those with a large family or somebody that wants to work from home as a bedroom could easily be set up as an office.
The yard is easy care and low maintenance with room for cars/boat or caravan, plus a powered shed and BBQ area out the back. Special features in wood heater, gas ducted heating and air conditioner.
All this set on a flat 1/4 acre close to shops, schools and transport, so be quick as this won't last!!!

This home is located within close proximity to the local primary school, shops and public transport.

Description:
FAMILY LIVING AT IT'S BEST!
This fantastic family home has been renovated from top to bottom and offers an easy to live floor plan for families of all ages.
Featuring two living areas, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, new kitchen with stainless steel appliances, updated family bathroom and a modern colour scheme throughout which is complimented by the deep, rich colour of the blue gum polished floorboards.
The master bedroom offers walk through robe, renovated ensuite and a large bay window allowing plenty of natural light to flood in - the remaining two bedrooms have plenty of storage with walk in robes and a very private view of the garden.
The outdoor living area is perfect for year round entertaining with cafe blinds surrounding the deck to keep the warmth in during winter - there is also an additional entertaining area perfect for summertime BBQ's.
Outside offers plenty of space for the kids to play on the fenced and landscaped 1/2 acre - coming complete with cubby house.
The circular driveway has dual access which makes it easy to maneuver and store campervans, trailers, boats and additional cars.
If this sounds like what you have been looking for come along for an inspection today!

Description:
Family Lifestyle On 3/4 Of An Acre
At the very end of a quiet private cul de Sac this spacious family home will provide you with all the comforts you desire! Generously appointed and immaculately presented throughout, the sense of space and style will greet you from the moment you arrive and admire the 3/4 acre landscaped allotment with a showpiece of established mature gardens, lawns and usable land. Designed to accommodate even the largest families in comfort, this 4 bedroom home (including a large walk in robe and En-suite) combines the highest quality fixtures and fittings throughout. All formal and informal living areas capture private garden views with the home offering 2 large rumpus rooms and a huge timber kitchen plus family/meals area opening to large entertainer's deck area, covered for versatility with relaxing spa. Special features include 9ft ceilings, gas ducted heating, Coonara, 2 split system heating and cooling units and ample storage. Outside offers a large double garage with internal access and remote doors, large workshop with concrete floor and power, 40,000 litre water tanks and sweeping verandahs.

Description:
It's All Here On 1/2 An Acre
Perfectly located on the high side of the road and within walking distance to everything the beautiful hills town of Cockatoo has to offer is this lovely brick home that has been renovated and ready for you to enjoy. The home boasts 3 bedrooms, modern bathroom, natural gas heating, polished timber floors, stunning kitchen with servery windows and quality appliances. There is also an adjoining meals area and lounge room with bi-fold doors that open up to a large decked entertaining area. All of this on a lovely 1/2 an acre with plenty of room to enjoy. Call today inspection is a must!!

Description:
Half an Acre of Possibilities
This original hills character cottage would be perfect for those starting out or on a modest budget.
It might need a little work, but the land is magnificent.
The property comes complete with country style kitchen, original bathroom, dining and lounge area opening onto the large new deck. Sit out on the deck in the evenings amongst the old rhododendrons and magnificent tree ferns and soak up the atmosphere that you can only find in the hills.
The two bedrooms are large and the home boasts 9 foot ceilings.
The yard is sunny and clear and features a couple of sheds/workshop and ample tiered flat areas for a shed or huge garage (STCA) or parking for multiple cars/trailers/boats or caravan or space to play or do what you like.
The homes special features include gas heating, wood heater and air conditioner.
The property is privately located and has all services connected.
He who hesitates will miss this one!!

Description:
Majestic Views, Almost 8 Acres, 50 mins to CBD
With views that seem to go forever, this character filled home has been built with an obvious passion for rustic charm, and architectural design. Set on 8 acres, the property offers the perfect mix of pasture and bush, as well as a large landscaped garden, a thriving fruit orchard & a massive veggie patch, ready for the next harvest. The home itself offers three bedrooms, including a huge light filled master bedroom with ensuite. A beautiful country-style kitchen, 2 separate study areas and a spacious bathroom complete the picture-perfect home. Other features include double glazed picture windows throughout, a double garage, split system heating and cooling, and a large wood heater. Outside offers an extensive entertaining area, the perfect place to sit back and take in the incredible view, whilst plenty of secluded sitting nooks have been incorporated into the beautifully designed garden. Built with recycled, handpicked timbers, the property offers the perfect tree-change, and yet is only 50 minutes from Melbourne. Yes it is possible to keep the job in the city and come home to your country oasis. With two fully fenced paddocks and scope for more, you can bring the ponies or simply relax in this private hilltop home. Located on a sealed road, there is also a chook pen, animal shelter & plenty of parking. Only 20 minutes to Pakenham, and close to Emerald, this is a place of relaxation & total solitude - start living your dream here today!

Description:
Character Home With A Modern Flair
This home is the perfect place to raise a family, with the charm and character that you would expect of a cottage, but large enough to accommodate the biggest family. The home boasts 3 large separate living areas, 4 bedrooms and a stunning modern kitchen with lots of storage, bench space and a chef sized stainless steel oven that is sure to impress the chef in the family. Set on a 1/3 acre, with sealed road frontage, there is ample car accommodation as well as space for a boat/caravan, together with a workshop as well a separate studio. Situated opposite the Cockatoo pony club, this property will allow your kids to partake in equestrian pursuits, but still have all the privacy you need. Contact today inspection is a must!!!

Description:
Immerse Yourself in Quality, Style And Sophistication On 2 Acres.
Surround yourself with 2 acres of nature & relax to the sounds of the local wildlife with not a neighbour in sight. Meander down the long driveway over the natural creek & discover this beautifully presented contemporary home that offers a lifestyle of seclusion & luxury. The open floor plan & light filled design is embraced by a spectacular bush outlook from every window & provides comfortable accommodation for you & your family. Offering 3 bedrooms plus study (could easily be converted to the 4th bedroom), Baltic pine kitchen with large bench space, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher plus there is gas & wood heating to ensure comfort throughout the cooler months. Entertain in style around the in ground heated pool or share a BBQ with friends in the paved undercover courtyard - the choice is yours. For those seeking both tranquillity & convenience, this one ticks all the boxes.

Description:
FAMILY VALUE WITH RUMPUS ROOM AND MUSIC ROOM!!!
Great sized family home, consisting of 3 living areas, lounge, meals, plus large rumpus room with wet bar and 4th bedroom converted to soundproofed music room.
The home offers 4 bedrooms including large master with walk in robe and modern ensuite, 1 year old hostess kitchen with huge Fisher & Paykal oven/ stove plus dishwasher. A central bathroom services the two robed bedrooms upstairs.
Summer evenings can be enjoyed on either the front or rear deck overlooking the backyard which has two useable flat areas for the kids plus a garden shed.
The home offers sealed drive with double carport and underhouse workshop and really is more than meets the eye.
Special features include 2 split systems, 2 gas space heaters and ducted vacuum.
All this set on a private road only a short distance to shops, schools and transport, so be quick as this won't last!!!

Description:
Californian Bungalow with the Modern Touch
It's not often that you get a great classic, yet updated home on a great flat block for sale.
Ideally positioned, you are sure to enjoy all of the character and charm this early 1900's cottage has to offer. Nestled on a large useable 1/4 acre allotment & boasting a lovely private setting, this home oozes street appeal & will demand your attention.
Set in a quiet street with a great useable sunny block, this character home is sure to please.
Featuring two large living areas, front and rear deck, 3 bedrooms - master with full ensuite and built in robes and a study nook, an open plan kitchen that includes dishwasher and stainless steel appliances, dining area and modern central bathroom.
Peace and privacy is assured
on over 1/4 an acre with a beautiful outlook.
Outside features an established cottage style garden, fully fenced yard and an extra large double garage plus workshop that has a concrete floor.
Special features include gas ducted heating, ceiling fans, 2 air conditioning units, leadlight windows, wood heater, high ceilings, ornate cornices
and plenty of room for cars/boats/trailers.
Don't let this opportunity slip!
